• IR Reflection Technology
• Eco-friendly Nano-formulation

product_details.name: Panache Cool Top Eco - Advanced Heat Reflective Roof Coating | 5KG
product_details.description:
• IR Reflection Technology for superior heat reduction
• Eco-friendly nano-technology formulation
• High SRI (Solar Reflective Index) rating for maximum cooling efficiency
• Easy roof application and coverage
• 5KG bucket size for extensive coverage
• Professional-grade cooling solution
• Weather-resistant and durable coating
• Reduces indoor temperature naturally
• Energy-saving solution for buildings
• Compatible with various roof surfaces
• Environment-friendly cooling solution
• Long-lasting thermal protection

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, structured layout aimed at promoting a product effectively. It includes a prominent main heading (id: `heading`) with bold, uppercase typography in a vibrant greenish teal color. Positioned below, the subheading (id: `subheading`) uses bold dark grey text to communicate the product type. A list of key features (id: `description`) appears in bullet format for easy reading, emphasizing innovation and eco-friendliness.

The right side displays a large product image (id: `product_image`). At the bottom-left, there's a bold price highlight (id: `price`) and a call-to-action button (id: `cta_button`) labeled with (id: `cta`). A subtle tagline (id: `tagline`) runs horizontally beneath the button.

The layout is framed by rounded rectangular borders and faint background accents that create a modern, soft-tech aesthetic. Decorative dotted and solid lines break up key sections of the design visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Green: `#09ADA0` (CTA button, borders, heading)
- Soft Mint: `#F5F9FA` (overall background)
- Charcoal Grey: `#333333`, `#444444` (subheadings and description)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (highlight background, CTA text)
- Highlight Green: `#4BC986` (accent circles)
product_color: The product image uses a refreshing and modern color palette to emphasize its cooling and eco-friendly properties. The primary colors are teal green (#00968D), white (#FFFFFF), and navy blue (#1B2A4E). Teal dominates the main body of the label, evoking coolness and environmental sustainability. White is used for the bucket body and text, providing contrast and readability, while navy is used in the brand logo and accent text to add professionalism and brand identity. The lime green (#A3C940) in the logo introduces a fresh, eco-centric touch. These hues blend harmoniously with distinctive contrast for emphasis, making them suitable for an eye-catching advertisement banner.
